Articles.Content: I remember having two mods installed at one point that allowed you to select different RTG fuels and added a decay element to it. I cannot for the life of me remember the names of the two. Can anyone point me towards them again please?

JDiminishingRTG is the only one I have listed for my possible future mod considerations. I know there was another one but if I've removed it from my list it's because it is no longer maintained and not functional in the latest version of KSP
NearFutureElectrical also had a patch for it to but JDiminishingRTG is just for that.
